io.atomix.primitive

Class DistributedPrimitiveBuilder<B extends DistributedPrimitiveBuilder<B,C,P>,C extends PrimitiveConfig,P extends DistributedPrimitive>

  • java.lang.Object
    • io.atomix.primitive.DistributedPrimitiveBuilder<B,C,P>
  • Type Parameters:
    B - builder type
    P - primitive type
    All Implemented Interfaces:
    Builder<P>
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    AtomicCounterBuilder, AtomicCounterMapBuilder, AtomicIdGeneratorBuilder, AtomicValueBuilder, ConsistentMapBuilder, ConsistentMultimapBuilder, ConsistentTreeMapBuilder, DistributedLockBuilder, DistributedSetBuilder, DocumentTreeBuilder, LeaderElectionBuilder, LeaderElectorBuilder, TransactionalMapBuilder, TransactionalSetBuilder, TransactionBuilder, WorkQueueBuilder

    public abstract class DistributedPrimitiveBuilder<B extends DistributedPrimitiveBuilder<B,C,P>,C extends PrimitiveConfig,P extends DistributedPrimitive>
extends Object
implements Builder<P>
    Abstract builder for distributed primitives.
